DOC.brief_summary: This study design determine novel combination SSRI , sertraline , NRI reboxetine increase antidepressant efficacy without sacrifice favorable safety profile SSRIs .
DOC.brief_title: A Comparison Sertraline-Reboxetine Combination Therapy Versus Sertraline Reboxetine Monotherapy Treatment Major Depression .
DOC.criteria: Subjects must fulfill criterion MDD without psychotic feature define DSMIV , base clinical assessment confirm Structural Clinical Interview DSMIV Axis I DisorderClinical Version ( SCIDI ) plus MDD Specifiers include Research Version SCIDI . HAMD ( 17item ) ≥ 22 Screening ( Visit 1 ) > 20 Baseline ( Visit 2 ) . Minimum CGIS ≥ 4 Screening ( Visit 1 ) Baseline ( Visit 2 ) . Known failure satisfactory respond adequate dose duration ( 12 week ) treatment clomipramine one SSRI , two SSRIs . Subjects > 20 % HAMD ( 17item ) improvement ( decrease ) Screening ( Visit 1 ) Baseline ( Visit 2 ) . Subjects uncorrected hypothyroidism hyperthyroidism .
